meaningMnemonic:
If you <kanji>compose</kanji> something with a <kanji>sigh</kanji>, it's because you're experiencing a <vocabulary>deep feeling</vocabulary>. You might express this deep feeling with an <vocabulary>exclamation</vocabulary>, as you <vocabulary>marvel</vocabulary> at the wonders of the world.

This word can be used for a range of deep feelings, good or bad, and can also be used for the expression of those feelings, so you'll notice that the English translation varies quite a bit depending on the context.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi for both kanji. You should be able to read it on your own.
